title: Out of the Dark
description: We are temporary. Finite.The choices we’ve made, the people we have loved. Who we used to be no longer matters.Because now it is all about the ending. And the ending always comes too soon.There’s fear in the dark. And behind every drop of light, the shadows creep and the darkness comes in the form of clawing, red-eyed monsters. They hunt us—stalk us…they are desperate to destroy us.But I have a reason to fight the darkness and everything in it. A small glimpse of light that lives within my golden-haired daughter, Lilly. She is my strength. She is my everything.Every life is an untold story, each scene unfolding until the final act. But our ending has yet to be written, and I will continue to protect us, until I cannot.AUTHOR NOTE: This book was previously titled Into the Light.
author: Claire C. Riley
